title: Notre histoire
content: ur project has won the ”Concours des Projets Innovants” of University of Technology of Compiegne and now we are the on pre maturation phase. Our team consists of eco-engineers who make harmony between man and nature their priority. We have 4 engineers working on product development, 4 business man working on business plan in international scale and a designer working on communication and product design. In order to make this project come true, we really need your help, we can not make it without you. Together, we can make it better !
caption: Nous voulons utiliser la technologie pour faire quelque chose d'utile, de génial pour vous, pour nous, pour le futur
